Question: Ecotron Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ecotron Corporation

Product: EVCC Controller

- Cutting-edge controllers for electric and autonomous vehicles
- Demonstrations featuring NVIDIA Robotics Jetson Dual Orin platform
- Application in various electric vehicle domains
- Commitment to affordable and scalable innovations
- AI integration in transportation and robotics showcased
- Expert team available for engaging with industry professionals and enthusiasts
- Exhibiting at CES 2024, booth #3867 in the West Hall
- Email info@ecotron.ai for more information and discounted tickets
Summary_cn:
生态科技有限公司

产品：EVCC控制器

- 用于电动和自动驾驶车辆的尖端控制器
- 展示NVIDIA Robotics Jetson Dual Orin平台
- 应用于各种电动汽车领域
- 致力于可负担和可扩展的创新
- 展示在交通和机器人领域的人工智能融合
- 专家团队可与行业专业人士和爱好者进行互动
- 在2024 CES展览会上展出，会展厅西区3867号展位
- 电子邮件info@ecotron.ai获取更多信息和打折门票
